argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | recnperf.k | |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |
| 2 |  | #P_elpri | |- ( S e. { RR , CC } -> ( S = RR \/ S = CC ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( S = RR -> ( K |`t S ) = ( K |`t RR ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_reperf | |- ( K |`t RR ) e. Perf |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl6eqel | |- ( S = RR -> ( K |`t S ) e. Perf ) |
| 6 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( S = CC -> ( K |`t S ) = ( K |`t CC ) ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_cnfldtopon | |- K e. ( TopOn ` CC ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_toponunii | |- CC = U. K |
| 9 | 8 | #P_restid | |- ( K e. ( TopOn ` CC ) -> ( K |`t CC ) = K ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( K |`t CC ) = K |
| 11 | 1 | #P_cnperf | |- K e. Perf |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_eqeltri | |- ( K |`t CC ) e. Perf |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_syl6eqel | |- ( S = CC -> ( K |`t S ) e. Perf ) |
| 14 | 5, 13 | #P_jaoi | |- ( ( S = RR \/ S = CC ) -> ( K |`t S ) e. Perf ) |
| 15 | 2, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( S e. { RR , CC } -> ( K |`t S ) e. Perf ) |
